description: Pay to drive in london zone checker

texts: The central London area is shown in red on this map. If you're not sure if your journey takes you through the central London area, enter a street name, postcode or landmark into the checker.
If you drive within the central London area you need to pay the LEZ and the ULEZ charges. If you travel Monday-Friday, 07:00-18:00 you also need to pay the Congestion Charge.
If you drive within the Greater London area, within the M25 but not within the central London area, you will only need to pay the LEZ charge.

The central London area is shown in the smaller red area on this map. If you're not sure if your journey takes you through the central London area, enter a street name, postcode or landmark into the checker. The larger LEZ area is in green.
If you drive within the central London area you need to pay the LEZ and the ULEZ charges. If you travel Monday-Friday, 07:00-18:00 you also need to pay the Congestion Charge.
If you drive within the Greater London area, within the M25 but not within the central London area, you will only need to pay the LEZ charge.
Our postcode checker can tell you which zone(s) an address is in. (These results will not show on the map above).
